articles.title: The UN says 68 African migrants were killed when a boat capsized off Yemen - AP News
articles.description: The U.N.'s migration agency reports that at least 68 African migrants have died and 74 others are missing after their boat capsized off Yemen. The mishap took place on Sunday. Abdusattor Esoev, head of the International Organization for Migration in Yemen, sa…
articles.content:
CAIRO (AP) A boat capsized Sunday in waters off Yemens coast leaving 68 African migrants dead and 74 others missing, the U.N.s migration agency said.
The tragedy was the latest in a series of shipwr… [+1593 chars]
